name: Model Trains: Experience Trans
description:
It’s time to test your driving theory in passenger train games! So let’s start with the basic precision driving skills of a train driver in this modern train driving games. Let show your professional abilities of driving through realistic scenes and open railway tracks in railway station games. You may face many challenges to get through and complete the tasks, but this game will definitely take you to a whole new level of satisfaction & fun.
Features:
- Realistic Locations
- Open/Close Doors
- Different trains to drive
- Intuitive train controls
- Amazing places: city, countryside, mountain, desert
- Realistic 3D train model steam, diesel and electric.
